Remarks: The estimate includes areas within a 2,000 m radius of drill holes, with a maximum drill depth of 603 m

The South arm-brine combines the values for contained tonnage and grade of the shallow south-arm brine and the deep south-arm brine; The Contained values were 203,000 and 109,000 tonnes; The grade values were 22 and 43 parts per million Li; the South Arm brine is very dynamic in nature where the "deep brine" comes as go in part due the railroad causeway
